item.title: Generate Kickstarts With Ansible
item.description: I wanted a way to generate kickstart files so I can easily spin up new VMs. I will also be making use of cloning, but I want to have a PXE boot server at some point as well. I’ve yet to test a deployment–and I’m sure there’s still tweaking to do–but the workflow is complete. You can find the relevant git commit here.
